Excellent watch excellent color and keeps great time

Over the years, I used to buy my watches for the wrong reasons. I learned that the hard way, because I used to travel a lot for work, and in 2019, I lost one watch, and I broke another, and those turned out to be very, very expensive mistakes.  I realize now that my daily watch has to be a blend of good looks, comfort, and good value for the money. The Burei ticks all those boxes while being great value for the money,. It has a nice weight to it, I like the blue face and the Burei details, and I feel very comfortable wearing this watch without worrying about losing it or breaking it.  One note, if you don't have a band pin remover, you should also buy one of those too. I had to remove 3 links to get a good fit. The band is hinged on both sides as well, so I ended up having to remove links from both sides to make sure the latch stayed in the center of my wrist. Now that it's adjusted, it's been comfortable to wear.

This is a beautiful watch!  From the looks of it, you would never know this is a$100 watch. The rose gold color is very pretty - not too brassy or dramatic but just right.  It goes beautifully with the brown dial. I hope it stands the test of time as I’m really happy with this purchase.
Such great quality and fast shipping!

评论概述: Feels great on the wrist. For only $120 bucks, it's definitely worth it.
评论详情: I mean what can I say? It beats paying $40,000 for the DAY-DATE 40 I dream of having some day. This knockoff is basically a reminder watch for myself to keep grinding until I can afford to get the actual real one I want. The main face of this watch is 5 stars because of the weight you feel from it. However, the President style bracelet is extremely light and fake feeling. But you know what? It still looks like the real one and no one else is going to feel it but you.  For $120 bucks, I do recommend this watch. I will be ordering the silver/blue one soon for more casual days, the brown that I have in the picture here is for when I feel like wearing some sweats/hoodie.

The watch is well made. From a distance, it could easily pass as a gold rolex watch. I have a real rolex gmt master II. I don't wear it as much as i could because I don't want to damage it. This Burei is just a small faction of the cost of a real rolex. Frankly, it looks just as nice as a real president rolex.

评论概述: Broke in barely over a month
评论详情: I received the watch on May 3rd, and the watch looks great and I was very pleased at first. I just received the watch today and I will say this, it was in a beutifull and well package box it even brought a cleaning cloth and a adjuster screwdriver for the bracelet. Over all Very happy with the watch! Great job Burei!!

From the moment I received and opened the box, I got the feeling this was a quality company and product.  The packaging and presentation was in good taste and I could hardly wait to see what was inside.  The watch surpassed my expectations (which is not usually the case in mail order). The watch was wrapped in protective covering and the instruction booklet was written well and in five languages.  Obviously the watch has diverse appeal.I have worn the watch for several days and enjoy how easy it is to read numbers, the brilliant colors and the good fit. This watch is replacing a twenty year old watch and I have a feeling I won't need replacement the Burei for years...and I really like the scratch resistant crystal!
I was looking for such an automatic and  nice watch, I'm satisfied with its price. This is such a stylish and versatile watch.

Since I have owned nearly every current Rolex model I was intrigued to see this “homage “ in the flesh after seeing its amazing pictures.  I was not disappointed!The design, the execution, the polish and detail is extraordinary to say the least.  The bracelet is solid link with solid end links to boot.  The movement is actually a Seiko 24 jewel automatic that is hand winnable and hackable.  The magnified date is quick set. Crystal is sapphire.Superb overall and an excellent value.
Classic style and great quality!
It's a great watch if you want to stand out from the crowd. It also comes in very nice packaging. You can tell it's a high quality product.
